concept.definition: The perforation was through tumour prior to surgery
The perforation was through tumour during surgery mobilisation
The perforation was away from the tumour

description: Indicates the options for indicating the type(s) of perforation.
name: NehtaNatureOfPerforation

text.div:
NehtaNatureOfPerforation

Indicates the options for indicating the type(s) of perforation.

This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/nehta-nature-of-perforation defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
through_tumour_prior_to_surgery Through tumour prior to surgeryThe perforation was through tumour prior to surgery
through_tumour_during_surgery_mobilisation Through tumour during surgery mobilisationThe perforation was through tumour during surgery mobilisation
away_from_tumour Away from tumourThe perforation was away from the tumour
